mapper.select: SELECT a.wo_idx, b.wo_name FROM sm_process a JOIN sm_work_order b ON a.wo_idx = b.wo_idx WHERE pr_cur_nm = #{str}
SELECT do_idx, do_name FROM sm_document WHERE do_type = #{str} AND do_state = 0

SELECT a.ti_idx, a.wo_idx, a.az_idx, a.ti_state, a.ti_analyst, c.item_name, f.ac_name, b.wo_pdt_cnt, date_format(ti_reg_dte, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS ti_reg_dte FROM sm_analysis_info a JOIN sm_work_order b ON a.WO_IDX = b.WO_IDX JOIN sm_item c ON b.ITEM_CD = c.ITEM_CD JOIN sm_orders d ON b.OR_IDX = d.OR_IDX JOIN sm_estimate e ON d.ES_IDX = e.ES_IDX JOIN sm_account f ON e.A_IDX = f.AC_CODE WHERE ti_idx = #{tiIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_anlz_data ( az_idx, az_brix_std, az_brix, az_water_std, az_water, az_ph_std, az_ph, az_temp_std, az_temp, az_viscosity_std, az_viscosity, az_sg_std, az_sg, az_dte ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT('AZ',SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'),3,6)),'-', (SELECT LPAD((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTRING(a.az_idx,10,12)),0)+1 FROM sm_anlz_data a WHERE a.az_idx LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('AZ',SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'),3,8)), '%')),3,0))) AS AZ), #{azBrixStd}, #{azBrix}, #{azWaterStd}, #{azWater}, #{azPhStd}, #{azPh}, #{azTempStd}, #{azTemp}, #{azViscosityStd}, #{azViscosity}, #{azSgStd}, #{azSg}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT az_brix, az_water, az_ph, az_temp, az_viscosity, az_sg FROM sm_anlz_data WHERE az_idx = (SELECT MAX(az_idx) AS az_idx FROM sm_anlz_data)
SELECT MAX(az_idx) AS az_idx FROM sm_anlz_data
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_work_order WHERE wo_idx = #{woIdx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_document WHERE do_idx = #{doIdx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_prod_result WHERE wo_idx = #{woIdx} AND pr_list_nm = #{prNm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_analysis_info ( ti_idx, wo_idx, do_idx, ti_name, ti_sample, az_idx, ti_analyst, ti_dte, ti_state, ti_note, ti_reg_dte, ti_reg_mem ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT('TI',SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(#{tiDte},'%Y%m%d'),3,6)),'-', (SELECT LPAD((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTRING(a.ti_idx,10,12)),0)+1 FROM sm_analysis_info a WHERE a.ti_idx LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('TI',SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(#{tiDte},'%Y%m%d'),3,8)), '%')),3,0))) AS TI), #{woIdx}, #{doIdx}, #{tiName}, #{tiSample}, #{azIdx}, #{tiAnalyst}, #{tiDte}, #{tiState}, #{tiNote}, NOW(), #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.ti_idx, a.wo_idx, a.do_idx, a.ti_name, a.ti_sample, a.az_idx, a.ti_analyst, a.ti_dte, a.ti_state, a.ti_note, b.az_brix_std, b.az_brix, b.az_water_std, b.az_water, b.az_ph_std, b.az_ph, b.az_temp_std, b.az_temp, b.az_viscosity_std, b.az_viscosity, b.az_sg_std, b.az_sg, c.wo_name FROM sm_analysis_info a JOIN sm_anlz_data b ON a.az_idx = b.az_idx JOIN sm_work_order c ON a.wo_idx = c.wo_idx WHERE ti_idx = #{tiIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE sm_process SET pr_cur_seq = (pr_cur_seq - 1), pr_cur_idx = (SELECT ${nextIdx} FROM sm_process WHERE wo_idx = #{woIdx}), pr_cur_nm = (SELECT pr_list_nm3 FROM sm_process WHERE wo_idx = #{woIdx}), pr_fin_cnt = (pr_fin_cnt - 1) WHERE wo_idx = #{woIdx}

UPDATE sm_anlz_data SET az_brix_std = #{azBrixStd}, az_brix = #{azBrix}, az_water_std = #{azWaterStd}, az_water = #{azWater}, az_ph_std = #{azPhStd}, az_ph = #{azPh}, az_temp_std = #{azTempStd}, az_temp = #{azTemp}, az_viscosity_std = #{azViscosityStd}, az_viscosity = #{azViscosity}, az_sg_std = #{azSgStd}, az_sg = #{azSg} WHERE az_idx = #{azIdx}

UPDATE sm_analysis_info SET do_idx = #{doIdx}, ti_name = #{tiName}, ti_sample = #{tiSample}, ti_analyst = #{tiAnalyst}, ti_dte = #{tiDte}, ti_state = #{tiState}, ti_note = #{tiNote}, ti_edt_dte = NOW(), ti_edt_mem = #{userId} WHERE ti_idx = #{tiIdx}

UPDATE sm_prod_result a JOIN sm_work_order b ON a.WO_IDX=b.WO_IDX JOIN sm_analysis_info c ON b.WO_IDX=c.WO_IDX SET a.PR_RE_RE_ST = 'Y' WHERE a.WO_IDX = #{woIdx} AND a.pr_re_idx = ( SELECT MAX(pr_re_idx) FROM sm_prod_result WHERE WO_IDX = #{woIdx} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sm_prod_result WHERE wo_idx = #{woIdx} AND PR_LIST_NM = '품질검사'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_prod_result WHERE pr_list_nm = '품질검사') AS analysisCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_process WHERE pr_cur_nm='품질검사') AS processingCnt FROM sm_work_order
